org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game

Class GameConversionRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.game.GameConversionRepository

  • public class GameConversionRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a repository for conversions of games.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

                                 GameType dst,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.Class<? extends GameConversion> conv)
        Inserts a conversion to this repository.
        Parameters:
        src - the source game type of the conversion
        dst - the target game type of the conversion
        name - the unique name of the conversion
        conv - the class of the conversion

      • getConversion

        public static GameConversion getConversion(GameType src,
                                           GameType dst)

        Parameters:
        src - the source game type of the conversion
        dst - the target game type of the conversion
        Returns:
        the first conversion from games of the type src to games of the type dst

      • getConversions

                                                                  GameType dst)
        Returns all conversions available from games of a specified type to games of another type.
        Parameters:
        src - the source game type of the conversion
        dst - the target game type of the conversion
        Returns:
        the conversions from games of the type src to games of the type dst

      • getConversion

        public static GameConversion getConversion(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the conversion of a specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the conversion
        Returns:
        the conversion of name name, or null if there is no conversion of such name

      • isConversionAvailable

        public static boolean isConversionAvailable(GameType src,
                                            GameType dst)
        Returns true if there is at least one conversion in this repository from a specified game type to another game type.
        Parameters:
        src - a source game type
        dst - a target game type
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one conversion in this repository from game type src to game type dst
